name: Despite the time
description:
Despite the time

Hi, welcome to my game for Mini-Jam 126: Lost

Despite the time is a plataformer with a special mechanich. Each time you die you will comeback stronger... and older. Try to save your sister in this short adventure.

Controls

Move with A, D

Jump with W

Attack with Space

Sprites

For this game I have used some sprites from this people:

https://incolgames.itch.io/dungeon-platformer-tile-set-pixel-art from https://itch.io/profile/incolgames

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset from https://itch.io/profile/0x72

Music

For this game I have used this music:

Menu: https://www.indiegamemusic.com/viewtrack.php?id=4965

Level: https://www.indiegamemusic.com/viewtrack.php?id=2449
